original_text: And they went to bury her: but they found no more of her than the skull, and the feet, and the palms of her hands.
korean_text: 가서 장사하려 한즉 그 두골과 발과 그의 손 외에는 찾지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: And they went to bury her
but they found no more of her
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그녀의 것을 더 찾지 못했고

sentences.original_text: than skull, and feet, and palms of her hands
sentences.korean_translation: 두개골과 발과 손바닥 외에는 찾지 못했다
